entry.title: Playing with Clojure Script!
entry.content:
Recently, I just got really excited about Clojure.

After studing the langage for some time I decided to build something simple and fun.

Since I was planning to also see how the langague works in the cljs version and how stable and fun would be to use it with figwheel, I decided to make the classic snake game using [clojure-script][clsj-website] with the figwheel flow.

The experience was amazing. The instant feedback you get with figwheel and the super expressive and clean code you write with Clojure made me rethink completelly how Iâ€™m developing user interfaces.

You can check it out by playing the game
